mapper.select: select id,user_name,user_realname,password,department,telphone, case when user_scope =1 then '内部用户' else '外部用户' end as user_scope, case when user_type =1 then '长期用户' else '单次用户' end as user_type, case when user_state =1 then '已启用' else '已停用' end as user_state, create_time from sys_user where user_name = #{username}
select b.* from sys_users_role a join sys_role b on a.role_Id = b.id where a.user_name = #{username}
mapper.update: update sys_user set isdelete = 1 where user_name = #{username}
update sys_users_role a set a.role_id = #{roleId} where user_name = #{username}
